name: Sled Bandit - Snowmobile Game
description:
He is Bandit, Sled Bandit. Many have heard of this mysterious figure, but few have seen him. It has been said that he is the best snowmobiler ever. According to rumors, Sled Bandit is an outstanding snowmobile handler.

The villagers are rumored that Sled Bandit will make the longest jumps and the biggest flips. He climbs the steepest hills and performs longest wheelies in his snowmobile.

Sometimes this mystical figure has been discovered in the spring fells of Sweden. Others may have met him on campfire in the Lapland.

Now is your time to take over this mythical hero. Race on a snowmobile on ten different tracks against the rest of the world. Be faster than anyone else. Make the front and back flips. Perform wheelies by snowmobile. Earn coins from tricks to upgrade your snowmobile.

Features:

- 9 snowmobiles with upgrades(engine and suspension)

- 10 tracks

- Share pictures to your friends!

- Great graphics

- True snowmobile sounds!
